adrFormatAddress: 10 W 74th St Suite 1E, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: Dr Bissoon is hands down the best doctor I have ever seen. His compassion and thoroughness and brilliance are truly like no other doctor and I have lived in London and gone to doctors in many parts of the world. I currently have a stage IV cancer and were it not knowing I was going to see Dr B every day, I don't think I'd be functioning at all. He is preparing a plan for me for residential treatment and I am very excited to go and come back to New York - God willing - healthy, happy and healed. And Leslie, his beautiful receptionist is divine in every way.

originalText.text: Dr. Bissoon is very smart, thoughtful and caring. He is up on the latest science and has helped me improve my health a great deal. His staff are great and attend perfectly to every detail. Going to his office is a healing experience all around.

text.text: Dr. Bissoon is very smart, thoughtful and caring. He is up on the latest science and has helped me improve my health a great deal. His staff are great and attend perfectly to every detail. Going to his office is a healing experience all around.

originalText.text: The highest level of care is what Dr. Bissoon and all his staff provide ... hands down.  As a doctor's daughter, I'm very picky about who and how I'm treated medically.  I offer the highest praise for Dr. B and his keen interest and care of my overall well being on many levels.  His depth of knowledge and medical science makes me yearn for more blood to be drawn so more answers can be arrived at and therefore more proactive steps taken for my health and longevity!

originalText.text: We had an excellent experience at Liondale Medical and with Dr. Bissoon. After much running around from other medical professionals, it was refreshing to find a great doctor with astute diagnostic skills. Thank god, he correctly diagnosed Lyme disease for myself and my daughter and put us on the correct path, saving us years of distress. Later I sent my husband there and he astutely spotted a large blood clot in his arm just before we were about to board a plane. We delayed our trip and took care of it but it saved us from a potential disaster. His integrated approach of Western and Natural medicine is how all health care professionals should be working these days. Coming from countries  where we have socialized medicine, it was not cheap. But well well worth is and a good investment towards our health!

originalText.text: If you are looking for a doctor that listens, analyzes, responds, cares and thinks outside of the box then Dr. Bissoon is the right doctor for you. Dr. Bissoon is unlike any other doctor and I’m so glad that my health is in his capable hands. He meets with his patient for long periods of time to understand exactly what is wrong, he takes copious notes to track progress, he responds promptly to emails and phone calls and asks for updates on a periodic basis. He follows how his patients are doing even after they’ve left the office. He’s incredible. Great doctor.
